node.title: Police respond to serious incident in Hawke's Bay
node.description: Police are responding to a serious incident which has forced two schools in Hastings into lockdown.
node.content:
["Police are responding to a serious incident which has forced two schools in Hastings into lockdown.", "", "
File photo. Photo: NZ / Marika Khabazi
", "RNZ understands armed police are on the hunt for an offender in Hawke's Bay today.", "A helicopter is now assisting police in their search efforts.", "The incident started in Flaxmere, but has moved to the wider Napier-Hastings area.", "Irongate primary school, in the suburb of Flaxmere, was locked down from 10am to 11am this morning.", "Principal Maurice Rehu said the school received the all clear to return to normal about 30 minutes later.", "RNZ understands both schools involved are now out of lockdown.", "Police expect to release further information soon."]
